textBox.richText: I am happy to announce a CFP for a IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security (TIFS) Special Issue on Biometric Spoofing and Countermeasures. Guest Editors: Nicholas Evans - EURECOM (France) Sébastien Marcel - Idiap Research Institute (Switzerland) Arun Ross - Michigan State University (USA) Stan Z. Li - Chinese Academy of Sciences (China) More information on the page HERE.
Special issue on Biometric Spoofing and Countermeasures
